alert.note: Alert for Rosebud (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 25 at 8:09PM MDT until May 25 at 9:15PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: The National Weather Service in Billings has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Rosebud County in southeastern Montana... * Until 915 PM MDT. * At 808 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 17 miles north of Hysham, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Torrential rainfall, 60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Heavy rain will cause ponding of water on roadways and in low-lying areas. * Locations impacted include... Ingomar. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
